snippet: The couple are associates at Weil, Gotshal & Manges, the Manhattan law firm.
lead_paragraph: Ashley Brooke Birnbaum, a daughter of Toby L. Birnbaum and Dr. Mark B. Birnbaum of Roslyn, N.Y., was married Saturday evening to Andrew Russell Arons, a son of Roni M. Arons and Howard A. Arons of Dix Hills, N.Y. Rabbi Joshua Strom officiated at the Pierre in Manhattan. The couple, both 28, are associates at Weil, Gotshal & Manges, the Manhattan law firm.
